name: RoboSquad
description:
Robosquad is a real time JRPG style game where you command a squad of robots. These robots consist of parts which give the robots stats and skills, the robots generate power over time which they spend to perform skills, they can also enter a guard state that stops power generation but makes the robot take severely reduced damage.

In this prototype it is just the basics of the combat system present. You can use the mouse to control the game or the hotkeys as displayed on the menu.

The full version has you start out with several random robot parts that you use to build a squad of robots. You then send these robots on missions of increasing difficulty in order to get scrap to upgrade these parts or to purchase new ones. With permadeath in mind the game would be about having good or bad runs

I'm posting this here to gauge if people like the combat or not and to ascertain any improvements that should be made to keep the core gameplay engaging.
